nodes.text: Ulli Fuolos was a male Duros, who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

When Alina Impeveri wanted to frame her father, Westa Impeveri, to make it seem that he had been meeting with the Trade Federation, she a slicer named Barrit Bosch to make a fake recording of her father meeting a representative of the Federation. To make the fake recording, the slicer had Fuolos wear extensive makeup to resemble a Neimoidian, with the name "Muna Galfut". Bosch then filmed "Galfut", and mixed the footage with some of Westa to create the recording.
